tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_technologies (
    technology_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    energy_saving_rating FLOAT,
    manufacturer_name VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 consumption_kwh FLOAT NOT NULL,
 technology_id INT NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES EnergySavingTechnologies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyAssessment (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 assessment_date DATE NOT NULL,
 assessment_result VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 technology_id INT NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES EnergySavingTechnologies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyUsage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumption(technology_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergySavings (
    saving_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_id INT,
    saving_date DATE,
    saving_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumption(technology_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyEfficiency (
    efficiency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_id INT,
    efficiency_rating DECIMAL,
    efficiency_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumption(technology_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyEfficiencyDevices (
	eed_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	eed_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	eed_category VARCHAR(100),
	eed_manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
	eed_year_of_manufacture INT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
	ec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	eed_id INT,
	ec_date TIMESTAMP,
	ec_power_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
	ec_units VARCHAR(50),
FOREIGN KEY (eed_id) REFERENCES EnergyEfficiencyDevices(eed_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergySavings (
	es_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	ec_id INT,
	es_date TIMESTAMP,
	es_power_saved DECIMAL(10,2),
	es_units VARCHAR(50),
FOREIGN KEY (ec_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumption(ec_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergySavingsComparison (
	esc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	es_id1 INT,
	es_id2 INT,
	esc_power_saved_difference DECIMAL(10,2),
FOREIGN KEY (es_id1) REFERENCES EnergySavings(es_id),
FOREIGN KEY (es_id2) REFERENCES EnergySavings(es_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionHistory (
	ech_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	ec_id INT,
	eed_id INT,
	ec_previous_power_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
	ec_previous_date TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (ec_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumption(ec_id),
FOREIGN KEY (eed_id) REFERENCES EnergyEfficiencyDevices(eed_id)
);
